name: test_e2e_with_logs[024_SQLI_ERROR_006]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_006` |
| **Name** | MySQL EXP overflow error injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND EXP(~(SELECT * FROM (SELECT version())x)) --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20EXP%28~%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%20%28SELECT%20version%28%29%29x%29%29%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~27000ms
- **Timestamp**: 04:53:36.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_006-1767070416928-j5sm5l pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_006 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20EXP%28~%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%20%28SELECT%20version%28%29%29x%29%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
04:53:36.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_006-1767070416928-j5sm5l pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_006 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20EXP%28~%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%20%28SELECT%20version%28%29%29x%29%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
